game.description: The queen's beloved cat, Mr. Whiskers, has gone missing. She is heartbroken and has offered a generous reward for her safe return.
game.reward: 500 gold coins and the queen's favor

tasks.description: Investigate the royal gardens where Mr. Whiskers was last seen.
tasks.objective: Look for any signs of Mr. Whiskers.

tasks.description: Speak to the royal gardener who claimed to have seen a shady character.
tasks.objective: Gather information on the potential cat-napper.

tasks.description: Follow the clues to the thief's hideout.
tasks.objective: Find Mr. Whiskers and bring her home safely.

game.title: The Kidnapping of Mr. Whiskers
